title: President launches Nelum Pokuna Theatre website
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Official website (www.lotuspond.lk) of the “Nelum Pokuna (Lotus Pond) – Mahinda Rajapaksa Theatre” was officially launched by President Mahinda Rajapaksa at an event at Temple Trees on 12 December. This was donated by the Chinese Government to cement the long standing friendship between the two…
